title: Please identify
content:
Can someone identify this font please. Thanks  
 [https://practo-fabric.s3.amazonaws.com/52e0c830b2334ef34f66601223d63c4e5...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506/https:/practo-fabric.s3.amazonaws.com/52e0c830b2334ef34f66601223d63c4e52f2100f763f0.jpg "https://practo-fabric.s3.amazonaws.com/52e0c830b2334ef34f66601223d63c4e52f2100f763f0.jpg")

[![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506im_/http:/i.imgur.com/dACdWA8.png "Hosted by imgur.com")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506/http:/imgur.com/dACdWA8)

Font: 

 Gabriola 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: dontbugme

comments.content:
It appears to be Gabriola, which Microsoft introduced with Windows 7:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Gabriola.font?text=The%20Children%E2%80%99s%20...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Gabriola.font?text=The%20Children%E2%80%99s%20Clinic "http://www.whatfontis.com/Gabriola.font?text=The%20Children%E2%80%99s%20Clinic")  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=372](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134506/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=372 "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=372")

I followed the second link to the Monotype site (which sells most of the Microsoft typefaces), but it doesn't appear to be listed. Identifont.com states that it isn't available for sale.
